38979974.review:
I'm "recommending" this, but only because it's free and very short.  But I'd say more attention was paid to the art and the voice acting than to the writing.  The voice acting is good, but a waste; if you wait to listen to it, it will take maybe 20 times as long to play through, and in that case I would not recommend it--too little payoff for the time.

The writing varies in the 3 stories.  The livecast one has the most-interesting characters, and the ice-cream truck one makes the most sense as a story. They all have strong hooks from scene to scene, but fail to deliver much at the end.  "Perceptions of the Dead" just ends suddenly, right after introducing a mystery, with no conclusion or ending at all, like it was interrupted.

38902512.review: For the price of free, it was actually a quite fun visual novel.

38573762.review: It was an interesting game overall but definately not what I'd call horror. It was more surreal than anything else, maybe a bit eerie in some places but not horror. All three stories were good and I found them compelling but I'd say you have to have an interest in ghosts or spirits beforehand or you might find it a bit dry. Personally, I liked the second and third story more than a first so maybe start with those if you're not sure if you'll like this game. All that aside the art was amazing and the voice acting was pretty good.

38493098.review: I really enjoyed playing this game, and thought it was awsome. The one thing that makes me sad is the fact I completed it in a day, it seems like you just get into a story and it ends. But besides that it was really fun and I hope there will be a volume 2!

38487434.review:
The art style is appealing, but the voice acting, script and gameplay left me disappointed. Maybe I am just not the target audience (I'm 27) because it felt like scary game for children, which is of course fine if that's what you're going for :)

Gampelay: I'd liked it better if it actually had any elements of choice, puzzles, and/or mystery solving. Even if it's about ghosts it didn't build up the player enough for you to get scared.

Voice acting: Less is more. I think this game would have been scarier and made you feel more connected to the characters if you could just read text and put your own interpretation and visualisation of it when playing. 

Script: Since it's set in a world where ghosts exist, of course it can be a bit unrealistic, but the lines just didn't feel believable that someone would actually say. Therefore, the way the story evolved didn't get me engaged.

38443242.review: I really liked it! Some backgrounds were missing or distorted.. not polished enough that is, but thats about the only complaint I have. Oh no, one more.. I NEED TO KNOW MORE! The stories line up but not perfectly and there are still so many questions I have after having played the three stories! I highly recommend this game and if this would be polished and expended I will have no problem paying a few bucks to get the whole story.

38437850.review:
A great "free" interactive visual novel game with short spooky stories.
Perceptions of the Dead has superb voice over and voice acting making 
the stories more believable and interesting. It's definitely worth a download!

38399468.review: Fantastic game, couldn't recommend it more! Voice acting, art and story were amazing and can't wait for a vol.2!

38389796.review:
Perceptions of the Dead is AMAZING! It has three very engaging stories; the stories consist of three characters, Jill, The Acolyte, and Tyrone on their unique adventures. The vibe, the universe, and the voice acting were spectacular! I love the point of view of being a watcher instead of a participant. 

The first story was hilarious and the voice character for Jill Count remarkably hits all the right points of portraying the nature of a video game streamer.  The second story was entertaining, and the twist at the end was relatable. The third story about Tyrone solving the troubles of the undead was a little confusing since I was unaware of the ending and how Tulip and the other girl ghost fitted into the whole scenario. 

Overall, Perceptions of the Dead will keep you at the edge of your seats and keep on grabbing your attention. There is good humor and slightly horror-friendly for non-horror fans to the extent where it gives you some low key scares, but no scary-scary scenarios.

38382774.review:
LOVED IT ACTUALLY. It was great honestly , very enjoyable. Like the diferent approach of our perspective as a 'watcher' of the main character live streaming. Instead of the typical either first person character or just watching texts and things going down. 

Really kept my attention throughout the game which is a big thumbs up :D 
waiting for vol 2!!

38365995.review:
This free-to-play game boasts solid voice acting, interesting (and occasionally amusing) writing, and a welcoming art style. You can easily take in the whole experience in the time it'd take you to stream a horror movie, and it's time well spent.

My only gripe is that the few choices offered have ultimately no impact on where the short narrative goes, and that's something I hope to see remedied if they follow up with another game. This limitation does not stifle the overal quality of this production. I recommend it enthusiastically.

38362448.review: Pretty short but with updates I'm sure it will get longer. Very good voice acting and engaging storylines. Looking forward to more content in the future!

I found this a pretty good, shot anothology of Visual Novels with a bit of Horror mixed in. The art was pretty nice and fresh, I quit enjoyed the styles. did the game developers pay everyone to give this game good reviews? because i found this game to be boring, as i skipped some of the long and boring text walls, waiting for something exciting to happen.

(edit)my point was more on the fact that people would rather buy games from a company that makes ''good games'' rather than games with extremely low like/dislike ratio. but sorry if i insulted you or something, it was more of a bad joke

but i still found the game to be a bit boring, and rather would not have voice acting in a visual novel

(edit again) i played it because i was searching for an interesting horror game to play. before installing this, i played doki doki literature club because it was listed as horror, and after finishing it, i decided to find a new one to play, which is of course when i found this game.

as i was saying, i was expecting a visual novel with interesting story/stories, but i found none here. and  as i was saying, voice acting in a Visual Novel is a bit useless, dont you think? the whole point of a visual novel is that its visual.

36555660.review: Going into this, I was expecting it to be a neat little time-waster, but not to enjoy it nearly as much as I did. For something that's free, it's definitely worth your time.  Ends on a cliffhanger though, and I can't help but hope that it gets a part two.

36549602.review: I loved this game. The voice over was surprisingly good, the story is pretty well too. The racial undertones were awkwards and some of the characters got on my damn nerves but over all this is pretty damn good. Easy recommend

36548889.review: A really good game. I loved the characters. If you want to spend 3 hours, go ahead. It's worth it. I think it's almost this good that they should charge some money for this. They might, who knows? 10/10, I'd love to see newer games from them.

36547059.review:
A ver, soy un fanatico del terror psicologico en todo el sentido, la verdad adore esta obra.
La musica estaba MUY buena y daba un ambiente suficientemente bueno, el doblaje estaba muy bien realizado pero tenia sus momentos en que se volvia muy mamon tener que escuchar lo mismo (En cuestion de tonalidad y personalidad) cientos de veces.
El arte esta DEMASIADO bien trabajada al punto en que se vuelve unica.
Las historias estan tambien MUY bien hechas y llegan a un punto en que ya no sabes quien es quien (Jill Count) la verdad en el poco tiempo que dedique es algo muy bueno y agradezco que sea gratis para el agrado del publico ya que de esta manera puede ser mas difundida tan excelente obra.
Desearia que de verdad hicieran traducciones de este gran juego o al menos pidieran a la comunidad de jugadores ayuda para ello ya que enserio necesita llegar a mas idiomas para lograr obtener el verdadero reconocimiento que se merece tan execlente obra audio visual que fue esta "Novela" ya que eso es.

36526571.review: Well, I highly recommend this game! It is definitely scary but lots of fun. I can't wait to see more of it. There are three separate stories of characters you can play through now. I'm looking forward to playing the final one. If you like scary, interactive games, this would be a good pick. There is nice music and sound and there are good characters. There are some jumpscares, but those aren't the ones that matter, and there aren't very many that I've seen so far. There's enough scares the game will give you, both thanks to your imagination and thanks to the game, and the game did a good job of making me think, "Ah....I don't really want to press continue, but I really want to see what'll happen next".

36384432.review:
The first story I aimed at was Jill Count; it was a bit of a different story but well related to today's media. I thought it was pretty good, for what it was. 

The second story I read was The Phantom Icecream Truck.. The main character first stuck me to be extremely interesting; so I kept reading. The story turned out to be great, and the ending was great as well. I love unveiling. The normality in it.

The third story, Perceptions of the Dead, I entered in hoping it would be the best story, after all, the title was named after it. The art style was the best, first to Jill Count, It also added a bit of humor as well. The main character has the vibe of a certain cartoon character. As well as references to other horror characters. Interesting choice, I get why it was chosen. Not the best I would say, I still believe in story line that the second story was better.  Nonetheless, interesting.

36378857.review: Short game, but very well put together. The art, the voice acting, the small stories, they were all very cool and I liked playing through it. However, it would have been nicer for the storyies to have more of an... Ending, or for them to at least be better wrapped up/explained.

36311253.review:
Great anthology! 

Reminds me a lot of the Call of Cthulhu Tabletop RPG, only episodic - in fact, the 'Ice Cream' Episode bears a bit of resemblance to 'I want you to kill the ice cream man', which was an actual adventure for the old tabletop Cthulhu RPG. 

Lots of fun, great art, awesome voiceovers.

36311052.review: more people need to play is game so GOOOOOOOOOOOODDDDDDDD

36309001.review:
Prosta, krótka i nawet wciągająca.


Tak generalnie można określić tę grę. 3 opowiastki dwójki bohaterów i ich kontaktów z duchami. Nie ma sensu rozpisywać się nad treścią tych fabuł, bo te są na tyle krótkie że lepiej jest poświęcić tę godzinkę i się samemu zapoznać. Powiem tyle, że historyjki rozkręcają się dopiero wtedy jak już się kończą i zostajesz z dość mocnym niedosytem (pozytywnym bądź negatywnym).

Gra generalnie przechodzi się sama, bo jedynie co musisz robić to przeklikiwać kolejne linijki dialogów. Nie uświadczysz tutaj żadnego typowego gameplayu,  poza chwilami gdzie będzie można dokonać jakiegoś wyboru, jednakże nie ma to praktycznie żadnego znaczenia, bo i tak wszystko sprowadza się do jednej konkluzji.

Kreska jak i głosy bohaterów są takie jakie można zobaczyć tutaj na zwiastunie i screenach... może się podobać lub nie. Mi odpowiadały.


Jeśli masz nudny wieczór i usilnie szukasz czegoś prostego do zagrania, to może być to tytuł dla Ciebie. Nie oczekuj jednak, że utoniesz w niej na długie godziny, bo już po jednej będziesz miał tę grę już z głowy.

36229851.review: Amazing! I love all the work put into it. The stories were great and the art work was amazing! Keep up the good work!

36227854.review: Nice graphic and voice acting but poor story. When 1st one was ok, 2nd was like WTF thats all? and 3rd like WHAT??? And thats wtf's was in bad manners like when they dont know how to end story and just cut it, feels like 1/2 of story or w/e. Though except endings it was ok and i rate this VN positive.

36227789.review: Хорошая игрушка, жаль без русского языка, но хотя бы бесплатная

36227734.review:
Short but High Quality. 

I heard about this from Project Trinity and any VN they recommend is usually worth checking out. I wish there were more, honestly, but this was free and super intriguiging. Also, it's just part 1 so maybe we'll get more ~

Neat Things: 
+ Neat art style. Each style was super fitting to the story (the live streaming versus Tyrone), and each story had a different way of evoking it. 
+ Camera. I liked the ability to sort of look around during conversations, but not much. Gave a spoopy feel. 
+ Lighthearted. 2/3 of the stories ended in a lighthearted way, true to the spoop factor.
+ Storytelling was intriguing, interesting, and surprisingly unique between all three of the stories. 
+ The voice acting was fun, added a layer of spoop. 

Meh Things: 
+ There was some lag in the sfx/voice when you clicked too fast and the previoux sfx/voice acting would keep going. 
+ "Perceptions of the Dead" the story that shares the name of the game, was intriguing but felt poorly paced and rushed. Like it was a snippet of a larger story that should just get shoved in there. Didn't feel as complete and flow as well as the other two stories.

36222897.review: Oh, look, some free spooky Halloweenish visual novel stories. Three of them. All tiny, albeit the "streamer vs hospital" was longer than others, I've felt. More interesting too. It's nothing that will give you nightmares. Real nice visual art style, fine music and voice acting, it's all pretty.

36214975.review:
Perceptions of the Dead is a "western style" Visual Novel type game. I have to say In my opinion it is one of the better VN releases I have played as of late, made even better because it is free. I found the art especially enjoyable compared to what you usually get when VN games release free. Another huge plus for Perceptions of the Dead is that is has voice acting, I really cant make a judgement call on wether it was good or bad voice acting. What I can say however is that I am glad it was there to begin with, most VN games do not even offer that as a feature.  

Overall I would recommend this to anyone who is a fan of Visual novels, or slower games in general and is looking for a good free to play release to hold them over. Its pretty neat.

36205022.review:
Fun and quick little visual novels that are voice acted. You can tell that the creators enjoyed making it. If you have any interest in visual novels or something thematic for this time of year you should give it a shot!

At the end of the day you can't go wrong with free!

36202299.review: Just a great game, played it on Stream last Night as it was Halloween and with the theme it matched perfectly. I loved the acting and how such a simplistic game can be this good. I'll recommend it I finished all stories in about an 1 hour and 2 minutes.

36198767.review: 一款叙事类文字游戏，音乐很棒，配音好评，氛围营造地不错，对话部分90%为英文常用语，不存在什么语言障碍，总而言之，这款游戏适合爱听故事的你。

36190376.review:
I'm not much for visual novels. I will say this flat out. Most are just slap some anime boob pics together, string them together with words and bam done collect your reward. But I had an immediate interest to this game when I saw the artstyle  and dialogue that felt like actual dialogue in the preview pictures. Because it's free I had no qualms to download it and have no regrets of doing so.

I only played through the Jill Count scenario which is a small time streamer going to a haunted place to hopefully get more views during the spoopy season. Her dialogue and voice direction were perfect, I have to say. Her side profile did look a bit odd and make her look like a different person . There were a couple other character voices that were a bit offputting but eh it's fine. 

The art itself imposes a nice unique style to the game as a whole and has some amazing effects added on in later scenarios for spoops. It's a refreshing reprieve to have something visually unlike any other. I found myself scanning each new scenario over to admire the art while the story was read to me by some good VAs.

As I said though I'm not much for VNs so not sure what to critique asides from dialogue, art and voice acting. Still, I would recommend this to anyone.

36190075.review:

36185192.review: Nice! features cartoon style art styles and has voice acting so you don't have to read it.

36181993.review: Its a great game. its nice with the voice acting and the picture are awesome. i didnt realize how long i was playing till i look on my feed. if you want to spook yourself out i would get it is free

39501522.review:
Really cool game  if you like hardly doing anything and like to just sit back and watch for a few hours or so.
othen that the stores are cool and I do recememed if like this kind of stuff or like creepypasta cuz this game gives of that kind of vibe to it.

39504799.review: This was a great game! Though it's more of a visual novel than an actual game. The stories are intriguing and they were very entertaining, with a few comedic moments to ease the tension. The audio was well done and really kept me in the moment, as well as the stunning visuals! I feel there could be more spooks, but understandably that would be better for later games (since it's clear the story has only just begun!). The spooks thats did appear were enjoyably creepy, and weren't too scary. But they were unsettling enough for me to think about playing with the lights on. The only thing I disliked about the game was that some of the dialogue didn't match the audio but overall it was an excellent game!
